text: Came across this paper in my reading on synthesis. Kind of love it. <http://www.semiootika.ee/sygiskool/tekstid/bruner.pdf>
intro is pretty academic, so naturally makes your eyes glaze over, but starting at pg. 6 the descriptions of “what is a narrative” are quite interesting.

anytime “semiotics” is in the mix, academia is a huge part of it. semioticians are theory nerds… but there is a whole interesting strand of marketing semiotics happening in the industry right now. Tim Stock from Parson’s is one of the leaders in the field and doing some interesting stuff
<@U0914MEN7> ! awesome call out!!!!! I Googled Tim Stock and found this Slideshare. Great stuff in here!

attachments.title: Trends & Innovation
attachments.text: an evolving lecture series by Tim Stock at Parsons School of Design

attachments.text: a lecture series by Tim Stock at Parsons School of Design
